p: Initiatives have commenced that aim to adapt agricultural sustainability to climate change through the use of CWRs to broaden and improve the cultivated gene pool as part of the International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (ITPGRFA, [ 50]). This effort is designed to collect, preserve, and prepare CWRs for evaluation and potential adaptation of crops to climate change. Other initiatives, such as Diversity Seek (DivSeek) are underway to begin evaluating the potential of crop and wild relative diversity present within gene banks [ 51].
